theRetrospect:IntoTheVoid.NAME: Into The Void
theRetrospect:IntoTheVoid.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL theretrospect:Trigger ALL timelines once and theretrospect:collapse them. NL Exhaust.
theRetrospect:IntoTheVoid.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Retain. NL theretrospect:Trigger ALL timelines once and theretrospect:collapse them. NL Exhaust.

theRetrospect:Overcore.NAME: Overcore
theRetrospect:Overcore.DESCRIPTION: theretrospect:Construct 3 timelines and be theretrospect:Frozen for !M! turns.
theRetrospect:Overcore.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: theretrospect:Construct 3 timelines and be theretrospect:Frozen for !M! turn.

theRetrospect:Misdirection.NAME: Misdirection
theRetrospect:Misdirection.DESCRIPTION: Play a random attack card from your discard pile, then theretrospect:construct 1 timeline.

theRetrospect:Transmute.NAME: Transmute
theRetrospect:Transmute.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust 1 card. Gain energy equal to the card's cost.
theRetrospect:Transmute.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Discard 1 card. Gain energy equal to the card's cost.

theRetrospect:Concurrency.NAME: Concurrency
theRetrospect:Concurrency.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage for each timeline you have.

theRetrospect:TapTheFuture.NAME: Tap the Future
theRetrospect:TapTheFuture.DESCRIPTION: Gain [E] [E]. NL Shuffle an *Empty to your draw pile.
theRetrospect:TapTheFuture.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain [E] [E] [E]. NL Shuffle an *Empty to your draw pile.

theRetrospect:SleightOfHand.NAME: Sleight of Hand
theRetrospect:SleightOfHand.DESCRIPTION: theretrospect:Paradoxical. NL Deal !D! damage. Replay your last card this turn.

theRetrospect:AlternativeReality.NAME: Alternative Reality
theRetrospect:AlternativeReality.DESCRIPTION: If you have an odd number of cards in your draw pile, gain !B! Block. Otherwise, draw !M! cards.

theRetrospect:Harvest.NAME: Harvest
theRetrospect:Harvest.DESCRIPTION: For each timeline you have, deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. Heal HP equal to unblocked damage.

theRetrospect:ChargeRifle.NAME: Charge Rifle
theRetrospect:ChargeRifle.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Increase the damage of ALL Charge Rifle cards by !M! this combat.

theRetrospect:DejaVu.NAME: Déjà vu
theRetrospect:DejaVu.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. Permanently increase ALL Déjà vu's Block by !M!. NL Exhaust.

theRetrospect:EnergyConversion.NAME: Energy Conversion
theRetrospect:EnergyConversion.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Add X+1 Miracles into your hand.

theRetrospect:RewriteHistory.NAME: Rewrite History
theRetrospect:RewriteHistory.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage for each card in your discard pile. Shuffle your discard pile into your draw pile. NL Exhaust.

theRetrospect:ShadowForm.NAME: Shadow Form
theRetrospect:ShadowForm.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, draw !M! additional cards.

theRetrospect:UnstableChronology.NAME: Unstable Chronology
theRetrospect:UnstableChronology.DESCRIPTION: Cost 1 less [E] for each time you take damage in this combat. theretrospect:Construct 1 timeline.

theRetrospect:Paradox.NAME: Paradox
theRetrospect:Paradox.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. theretrospect:Delusional. NL You cannot play any cards when your hand is full.
